product_name: Von Zipper Booker Polarized Sunglasses - Black Satin Frames - Men's
long_description: The VonZipper Booker Polarized Sunglasses feature sleek, sporty 3-layer lenses, optically enhanced with polarizing filters and a scratch-resistant hard coating for all your outdoor activities. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black Satin frames come with polarized gray lenses for neutral, true color perception in bright light. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Lightweight nylon Grilamid frames offer a consistent fit, flexibility and impact resistance at any temperature. The VonZipper Booker Polarized Sunglasses feature stainless-steel optical hinges.
short_description: The VonZipper Booker Polarized Sunglasses feature sleek, sporty 3-layer lenses, optically enhanced with polarizing filters and a scratch-resistant hard coating for all your outdoor activities.
